Server.Name: Welcome to Canada v2.0 Romero Edition
Server.Description:
Welcome to Canada version 2.0 - Romero Edition. Very Hard. Same as regular version but with George A. Romero movie rules. - Must sever brain stems to stop zombies. Destroy the heads. - Zombies are slow, never run no matter the settings. - Zombies see and hear you from much further away. Must be very quiet and remain hidden to avoid detection. - More Zombies, yes even more than ever! - Better starting gear. Advanced Workbench, Hunting Rifle, Pistol, All basic tools, Smithing and workbench books.
For more information on this mod please visit the 7 days to Die forum located here: https://7daystodie.com/forums/showthread.php?86541-Welcome-to-Canada
The following download link is for mod launcher use ONLY! For a direct download link or server admin files, please visit the forum.
